project_overview.name: Typing Speed Test
project_overview.description: A Python application that measures a user's typing speed and accuracy.
project_overview.purpose: To provide a tool for users to assess and improve their typing skills.
project_overview.audience: Individuals looking to improve their typing speed and accuracy, educators, and employers assessing typing proficiency.

technical_requirements.gui_framework_justification: Streamlit is chosen for its ease of use in creating web-based interactive applications, making the typing test accessible through a browser.

project_structure.description: Modular project structure with separate modules for core logic, UI, and data handling.
project_structure.folders:
typing_speed_test/
├── core/
│   ├── typing_test.py
│   └── text_generator.py
├── ui/
│   └── streamlit_app.py
├── tests/
│   ├── test_typing_test.py
│   └── test_text_generator.py
└── README.md

file_breakdown:
File: typing_speed_test/core/typing_test.py
Purpose: Contains the core logic for running the typing test, including calculating speed and accuracy.
Key Components: TypingTest class (start_test, process_input, calculate_results).
Dependencies: time, text_generator
Interactions: Uses text_generator to get the text to type; provides results to the UI.

File: typing_speed_test/core/text_generator.py
Purpose: Generates random text for the typing test.
Key Components: generate_text function (returns a string of random words).
Dependencies: random
Interactions: Used by typing_test.py to get the text for the test.

File: typing_speed_test/ui/streamlit_app.py
Purpose: Implements the user interface using Streamlit.
Key Components: Streamlit UI elements (text input, display text, results display).
Dependencies: Streamlit, typing_test
Interactions: Uses typing_test.py to run the test and displays the results.

File: typing_speed_test/tests/test_typing_test.py
Purpose: Contains unit tests for the typing_test module.
Key Components: TestTypingTest class (test_calculate_results).
Dependencies: unittest, typing_test
Interactions: Tests the functions in typing_test.py.

File: typing_speed_test/tests/test_text_generator.py
Purpose: Contains unit tests for the text_generator module.
Key Components: TestTextGenerator class (test_generate_text).
Dependencies: unittest, text_generator
Interactions: Tests the functions in text_generator.py.

File: typing_speed_test/README.md
Purpose: Provides a description of the project and instructions for running it.
Key Components: Project description, installation instructions, usage instructions.
Dependencies: None
Interactions: None

implementation_strategy.development_phases:
1. Core logic implementation (typing_test.py, text_generator.py)
2. UI implementation (streamlit_app.py)
3. Testing (test_typing_test.py, test_text_generator.py)
4. Deployment (Streamlit sharing or similar)
implementation_strategy.test_file_requirements: Unit tests for core logic (typing_test.py, text_generator.py) to ensure accuracy and reliability. Test files should cover edge cases and boundary conditions.
